name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development and project management, delivering high-performance solutions across healthcare and finance sectors. Expert in implementing AI and machine learning strategies, with hands-on experience across the full stack utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in developing cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Skilled in leading projects that require asynchronous collaboration and remote work environments. Adept at building secure, maintainable software solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Enthusiastic about leveraging modern technologies and methodologies to enhance system performance and drive significant real-world impacts.
